characterDescriptions.Surgeons: surgeon figures in scrubs, professional expressions

scenes.prompt: A surgeon figure in scrubs with a shocked, guilty expression. A patient silhouette lies on a table. The scene is serious. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
The word 'ACCIDENT' with emphasis. An 'oops' expression on the surgeon figure in scrubs. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Atul Gawande is a famous surgeon.
scenes.prompt: A surgeon figure in scrubs standing confidently with arms crossed. A nameplate shows 'ATUL GAWANDE'. Medical credentials float beside him. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: He was curious about something disturbing.
scenes.prompt: The surgeon figure in scrubs with a concerned, investigative expression. One eyebrow raised. A magnifying glass in hand examining data. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: World-class surgeons were making preventable mistakes.
scenes.prompt: Multiple surgeon figures in scrubs shown with error symbols and warning triangles above them. Elite credentials shown alongside the mistakes. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Mistakes they knew better than to make.
scenes.prompt: A surgeon figure in scrubs with a thought bubble showing they know the correct procedure, while their hands perform incorrectly. The disconnect is clear. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
A surgeon figure in scrubs with diplomas, awards, and excellence certificates surrounding them. The word 'BAD' is crossed out. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: They were excellent doctors having bad moments.
scenes.prompt: A timeline showing an excellent surgeon figure in scrubs with checkmarks and success, then one small section showing a stumble. One bad moment among many good ones. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: So Gawande worked with the World Health Organization and developed a 19-step surgical checklist.
scenes.prompt: The surgeon figure in scrubs labeled 'GAWANDE' shaking hands with a figure in front of a WHO logo. Between them, a document shows '19-STEP CHECKLIST'. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
A surgeon figure in scrubs checking a patient wristband against a chart. A checklist shows this as step one with a checkbox. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Mark the correct leg to operate on.
scenes.prompt: A surgeon figure in scrubs using a marker to put an X on the correct leg. The other leg remains unmarked. A checklist shows this step with a checkbox. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Multiple surgeon figures in scrubs all nodding in agreement. These are basics everyone learned. Common knowledge. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Multiple surgeon figures in scrubs shown in before and after comparison. No personnel changes. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: When cognitive load peaks, even experts fail.
scenes.prompt: A brain diagram showing overload with too many inputs. Even a surgeon figure in scrubs with elite credentials stumbles under the pressure. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
A checklist document acting like a safety net, catching a falling surgeon figure in scrubs. The checklist saves them from errors. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
